text: Chinese imperial guard may refer to various units and organisations in Chinese history these include *Imperial Guards (Tang dynasty), the imperial guards of the Tang dynasty *Jinyiwei, the imperial guards of the Ming dynasty *Imperial Guards (Qing China), the imperial guards of the Qing dynasty ==See also== *Kheshig, the imperial guards of the Mongols *Manchukuo Imperial Guards, the imperial guards of Manchukuo *61889 Regiment, the People's Liberation Army united tasked with protecting the top leadership of the People's Republic of China
title: Chinese imperial guard
